Jagged Alliance 2 Stracciatella.author: d10sfan
Jagged Alliance 2 Stracciatella.license: Original in SFI-SCLA with Additions in Public Domain

notices.label: Requires both Wildfire and Classic DLC
Uses jpexs-decompiler.
Set Music Mode in in-game options to All Codecs
Read engine README for how to switch levels.

A possible fix if encountering sluggish mouse movement is to set in launch options SDL12COMPAT_SYNC_TO_VBLANK=1 %command% and  then run seta com_fixedTic "1" in the game console. From https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Quake_4#Issues_fixed
Download the linux demo manually, run and follow the steps, then copy the files to demo/ inside the steam installed demo directory.
Applying settings in Settings menu might result black screen; return to desktop, exit and restart the game.
Put retail version in full directory, so that full/etqw-rthread exists inside the steam installed demo directory.
Applying settings in Settings menu might result black screen; return to desktop, exit and restart the game.
On first start, license key will be requested, which can be found in Steam by getting the CD Key. On the Steam Deck, you may have to enter that key in manually instead of using the clipboard.
Mods should go in the linuxdata directory. Adds foxWSFix by default.
Requires Steam Linux Runtime to be installed.
Requires Oldunreal installer, which requires a manual download and Wine to be installed. System/README.txt should be referred to.
Uses library pack from legluondunet.
Requires Source SDK 2013 Singleplayer and Steam Linux Runtime to be installed.

dxx-rebirth.author: d10sfan
dxx-rebirth.license: GPLv3 with Original Code in Parallax License

notices.label: Requires Freespace 2 installed in same Steam library folder and run with luxtorpeda-dev client at least once.
Need to configure the paths to the POD files using the in-game configuration menu for the first time.

Ren'Py.author: dreamer/Jpx
Ren'Py.license: MIT, LGPLv2.1 and other free/libre/open source licenses

notices.label: Requires RTCW to be installed.
Requires Steam Linux Runtime to be installed.
Uses upstream launcher.
Run the game with Proton at least once, to get the steam key and account register finished. Then, launch the game with Luxtorpeda.
Downloads FluidR3_GM.sf2 automatically. Can override SDL_SOUNDFONTS in launch options.
Requires RetroArch to be installed and any cores to be installed from DLC.
Requires RetroArch to be installed and any cores to be installed from DLC.

Use RetroArch other option for other cores. Can use steam launch options - %command% CORENAME EXTENSION RELATIVEPATH, where CORENAME is the name of the core from the cores directory ("snes9x", without the _libretro.so, EXTENSION is the expected extension of the game file to lookup, such as "sfc", and RELATIVEPATH is the relative path in quotes to the game file to override the search.

noticeMap.save_game_dir: Saves will be stored in game directory.
noticeMap.in_progress: Engine is still in progress so not all features may be implemented.
